1002:2: trailokye vyavahāramātre sati paramārthabhimānāt tattvārthānavagāhibhiḥ sattvairvastusvabhāvavivekadvāreṇa viparyayajñānasaṃprāptaye [śāstra]racaneyam ||
1002:4: atrānatidūre'pyālokamātrayā bhāsamāne deśe rajjurūpasādhāraṇadharmopalabdhito bhrāntyā sarpa evāyamiti niścayarūpaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate |
1002:10: tadanupalabdhau rajjūpalabdhirapi sarpa iti buddhivad bhramamātrā kutrāpi līyate |
1002:11: atha yathā rajjujñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ tathā te'pyavayavāḥ|
1002:12: tatkhaṇḍacchedādiṣu dṛśyamāneṣu teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ na nirdhāryate |
1002:16: yathāvayavādivibhāgena pṛthagrajjvādiṣu vicāryamāṇeṣu svarūpānupalabdhito rajjvādibuddhirapi sarpa iti buddhivada bhrāntā tathā digbhāgādīnapekṣya ghaṭapaṭādayo vyavahārajñānagocaro yāvat sarve cidātmakā eva (āśritā eva) |
1002:20: yattvāśritavastūnāṃ sarveṣāmantyaṃ paramāṇudravyaṃ niravayavamekaṃ tasyāpyacintyasvarūpatvenānupalabhyatvāt tadapi khapuṣpamālāśaśaśṛṅgādibhiḥ samamavastukameva sidhyate |
1002:21: kiṃca kathamacintyannakṣaṇatvahetunā paramāṇudravyaṃ sadapyekaṃ nāstīti jñātuṃ śakyate |
1002:23: tathā hi yathā satāṃ ghaṭapaṭaśakaṭādīnāṃ dravyāṇi prākpatyagādinānādigbhāgavattvān nānāvayavīni vidyante yadi paramāṇudravyamapyasti tadāvaśya digbhāganānātvāt prākpratyagādinānāvayavāḥ svīkartavyāḥ |
1002:24: satsu tu nānāvayaveṣu paramāṇudravyamekaṃ na sidhyate |
1002:33: bhrāntaṃ tadapyasamyakvād yathā bhānaṃ tathāsti na |
1002:35: bhrāntyāpi tayā yad dravyasvarūpaṃ jñāyate tathārūpaṃ dravyaṃ tannāsti |
1002:40: tathā hi loke'pi bījādijanakābhāve janyāṅkurādayaḥ santīti dharma īdṛṅ na dṛśyate |
1002:44: yathoktaprakāreṇāśritamātre sati trailokye'smin yo ghaṭādisthūlabuddhiṃ vihāya sūkṣmabuddhyā dravyahīnaṃ vyavahāramātraṃ niścinoti yathā rajjjau sarpa iti jñānādāgatabhayo viśeṣaṃ vicārya rajjuniścaye sarpānnirbhayo bhavati tathā rāgādijanakavastūni parīkṣya tenāpi rāgādikleśajālāni suṣṭhu akṛcchreṇa acireṇaiva tyajyante |
1002:48: ghaṭādyartheṣu sadrūpeṇa cintyamāneṣu ayaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ śakaṭaḥ iti vyavahārānābadhnanti tathā pūrvasiddhato vyavahāraḥ kartavyaḥ |
1002:49: tataḥ paraṃ rāgādikleśāṃs tyaktukāmena yathoktaparamārthalakṣaṇena vastūni parīkṣitavyāni |
1002:50: tathā parīkṣyamāṇeṣu vastuṣu kāmādikteśajālāni na punarutpadyante ||
